She replied: I think you need to take` mass' off and put( in)` obsessive'( instead). He's obsessed with me! They're looking at selling 1.5 million to 1.6 million vehicles in the U.S., said Bill Kelly, owner of Kelly Cars in Moon Township, Pa., near Pittsburgh.`` And it's going to be less dependent on fleet sales.'' He accepted the huge responsibilities that come with being an NFL starting quarterback.`` The quarterback position, that's the nature of it,'' Michael Vick said of the swings between praise and criticism. Everything's thrown on your shoulders as a quarterback.`` I accept it. I respect it. That's the responsibility that you take on when you get up under the center. There were far too many hands on the steering wheel, which, in my view, was a formula for running the truck into a ditch, writes Donald Rumsfeld .
